授業方法:
Face-to-face lessons

This course will be instructed through seminars examining different aspects of the TOEIC test. Students will have opportunities to have discussions based on topics that are relevant to the test and through activities that are designed to develop vocabulary. There will be a strong emphasis on group and pair work throughout.
